rows.label: qst202002_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes! They helped me gather ingredients, 
so I thought I'd thank them with a meal.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah, food tastes better when eaten together. 
You're most welcome.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0005
rows.name: This person is my Driver, Dofusei-san.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0006
rows.name:
He's currently in poor health due to illness, 
but back then he was an amazing Driver.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0007
rows.name:
After retirement, he's spending 
his remaining years here. Tee hee...

rows.label: qst202002_msg0009
rows.name: You can tell they get on well together.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll prepare the meal right away, 
so please wait just a little bit.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0011
rows.name: Is there anything we can help you with?

rows.label: qst202002_msg0012
rows.name: Oh, well now that you mention it...

rows.label: qst202002_msg0013
rows.name:
Well then... 
could you get some firewood?

rows.label: qst202002_msg0015
rows.name:
We always get firewood from Edward-san 
down at Saets Lumber Co.

rows.label: qst202002_msg0016
rows.name: Thank you so much for all this!
